title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 902.1 - Applicability of other laws and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 902.1 - Applicability of other laws and regulations

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise indicated in Part 900 or
901 of this Title, life care community component facilities, i.e., nursing
home, home health care, adult home, shall be subject to all applicable existing
laws and regulations pertaining to residents' rights and organizations under
articles 28 and 36 of the Public Health Law and article 7 of the Social

Services Law and regulations promulgated thereunder, including, but not limited
to sections
415.3, 764.1, 767.1, and 771.7 of
this Title and 18 NYCRR sections 487.5 and 488.5. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
902.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
